Dialogue: Hm I don't seem to recognize you. You're not from around here, are you?
Whew! This wood choppin' has me parched!
C'mere and help me out a little

Intro: Hey there wanderer. My name is Frank.

Unfortunately our town Sunnyville is in
danger.

The Goblin in the Northern Forest
threatens us.
If I lend you my sword can you help us?

Thank you traveler! We will forever be
indebted to you.

The sword is on that table. Please take
it and save our town!

You can take the path that points north.
it will lead you to the Goblin!
AfterIntro: The sword is on that table.

Please take the north-bound path and
save us!
GoblinDead:
Thank you for saving us! Here is the key
to the city!
